titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE REFERRAL CONVERSION RATE - Description

div.p: NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE REFERRAL CONVERSION RATE is the total number of cases assessed as eligible for NHS Continuing Healthcare in the REPORTING PERIOD, as a percentage of the total number of referrals completed in the REPORTING PERIOD.
NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE REFERRAL CONVERSION RATE is derived from PERSONS NEWLY ELIGIBLE FOR NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE and NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE REFERRALS CONCLUDED.
